Write-Up Text: The upcoming federal budget is growing topic of interest on social media and speculation is rife as to where the government will prioritise spending. With calls for fiscal rules to better control spending and support for homeless youths to SMS sender ID registries to combat spam texts people are speculating whether the budget will deliver winners or losers. From defense strategic overhauls to interrogating budget priorities through $10 billion aircraft carriers and budget deficits people are primed and watching.
